text: Jeffrey "Jeff" Sauer (March 10, 1943 - February 2, 2017) was an American ice hockey player and coach. He was the head coach at the Colorado College from 1971 to 1982 and the University of Wisconsin from 1982 to 2002. He was born in Fort Atkinson, Wisconsin. Sauer died from pancreatic cancer on February 2, 2017 at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American ice hockey centers Category:Cancer deaths in Wisconsin Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Ice hockey coaches Category:Sportspeople from Wisconsin
title: Jeff Sauer
